name: HeaderFooterGroup
description: Represents the options in page layout margins.

properties.name: state
properties.description: Gets or sets the state of which headersfooters are set.

properties.name: useSheetMargins
properties.description: Gets or sets a flag indicating if headersfooters are aligned with the page margins set in the page layout options for the worksheet.

properties.name: useSheetScale
properties.description: Gets or sets a flag indicating if headersfooters should be scaled by the page percentage scale set in the page layout options for the worksheet.

properties.name: defaultForAllPages
properties.description: The general headerfooter, used for all pages unless evenodd or first page is specified.

properties.name: firstPage
properties.description: The first page headerfooter, for all other pages general or evenodd is used.

properties.name: evenPages
properties.description: The headerfooter to use for even pages, odd headerfooter needs to be specified for odd pages.

properties.name: oddPages
properties.description: The headerfooter to use for odd pages, even headerfooter needs to be specified for even pages.
